meanings.definition: A woman who is in charge of a post office.
meanings.sent1: The friendly postmistress helped me mail my package.
meanings.sent2: The postmistress sorts and delivers letters to everyone in town.
meanings.sent3: The postmistress joked that she had more stamps than fingers!
meanings.sent4: She ruled the post office like a queen, the postmistress of all she surveyed.
meanings.sent5: The postmistress, with her keys jingling, was the heart of the small post office.

meanings.definition: A female postal worker in charge of delivering mail.
meanings.sent1: Our dedicated postmistress ensures our mail reaches us on time.
meanings.sent2: The postmistress walks her route every day, rain or shine.
meanings.sent3: The postmistress playfully pretended to deliver mail to her cat.
meanings.sent4: She moved through the neighborhood like a silent ghost, the postmistress of letters.
meanings.sent5: The postmistress, with her mailbag heavy, trudged through the snow to deliver packages.
